articles.author: Shyam Vasudevan
articles.title: Asian champion at 19, Aman Sehrawat is coming for Ravi Dahiya's throne - ESPN India
articles.description: This marks Aman Sehrawat's first big medal on the senior circuit, as he wins the title that Olympic silver medallist Ravi Dahiya had won last year.
articles.content:
Aman Sehrawat is 19. And he's the best wrestler in Asia.
The teenager confirmed his name in Indian wrestling's upper echelons by winning the Asian Championships in Astana, Kazakhstan on Thursday. He… [+4031 chars]
